Basics.name: Yang Hou
Basics.summary: An undergraduate student in Peking University who works on nonequilibrium many-body physics.

Research Experience.name: Institute of Condensed Matter and Material Physics, School of Physics, Peking University
Research Experience.position: Research Assitant in Condensed Matter Theory
Research Experience.summary: Investigating non-equilibrium many-body dynamcis in classical systems.

Research Experience.name: Max Planck Institute for the Physics of Complex Systems
Research Experience.summary: Exploring geometric effect in Classical FLoquet systems.

Publications.name: Floquet-engineered emergent massive Nambu-Goldstone modes
Publications.summary: Engineer symmetries, relize and manipulate emergent Nambu-Goldstone modes in non-equilibrium systems.
